reviews.reviewText: The first day I used this I instantly loved it . The soap felt / feed so gentle and leaves you feeling clean under there. After applying the oil outside , I was still fresh and no smell at all and it was 91 degree outside . By the way I used some soap on my underarms lol. I didn’t need deodorant for some reason , fresh. I would order more very soon. The sent of the oil and soap is very nice and subtle. Oh and my yoni felt tighter, I just pray not to suffer much :-).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've used yoni oil before, this one seemeda bit watered down. Smell is...Woodsy maybe. Easy to push out the bottle. Soap does not make you feel dry. Feels clean...but I guess you could get the same feeling cleaning with ivory soap for 3 minutes. I do feel more clean using the soap and oil. Skin feels soft as well.
